Farid Belkahia (1934 - 2014) bụ onye Morocco na-ese ihe n'oge a na onye na-eme mgbanwe agụmakwụkwọ. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke School of Fine Arts of Casablanca site nafo6 1962 ruo 1974, n'oge Casablanca school modernist movement. Dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ọ rụrụ ọrụ karịsịa na eserese, ọrụ ígwè na akpụkpọ anụ.

A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya na Marrakesh. Ndị enyi nna ya gụnyere onye Poland na-ese ihe bụ Olek Teslar na onye French na-ese ihe bụ Jeannine Guillou Site na Guillou, Farid Belkahia zutere Nicolas de Staël na 1937.
Belkahia gụrụ akwụkwọ na École des Beaux-Arts nke Paris 1954 ruo 1959. Ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na Prague wee laghachi Morocco na 1962.
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-emetụta aesthetics nke Western minimalism na modernism, ọ nwekwara mmasị na ọdịbendị ọhụụ nke ihe nketa Morocco, na-etinye nke a n'ime ọrụ ya.
